## warnUnstable

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/warn-unstable.ts" sourceLine="17" packageName="commandkit" />

Emit a warning for unstable features in CommandKit.



*Example*

```ts
warnUnstable('MyUnstableFeature');
```

```ts title="Signature"
function warnUnstable(name: string): void
```
